properties.name: Manhattan Potato Festival
properties.description: Annual mid-August festival celebrating Manhattan's potato farming heritage. Parade, 5K, car show, live music.

properties.name: Manhattan Area Museum
properties.description: Local history museum with exhibits on settlement, agriculture, and community milestones.

properties.name: Taylor Park
properties.description: Main town park with green spaces, picnic areas, playground, and walking paths.

properties.name: Altenbrand Park
properties.description: Community park at Yadon Road and W Dry Creek Road.

properties.name: Manhattan Farmers Market
properties.description: Weekly farmers market held Wednesdays in season with fresh produce and crafts.

properties.name: Gallatin River Access
properties.description: Access point for fishing, rafting, and kayaking on the Gallatin River.
